MobileSettings.name: MobileSettings
MobileSettings.label: Mobile Settings
MobileSettings.description: Represents MobileSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

dashboardMobile.description: dashboard Mobile field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enableDashboardIPadApp.description: enable Dashboard I Pad App field of DashboardMobileSettings metadata component.

enableImportContactFromDevice.description: enable Import Contact From Device field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enableLightningOnMobile.description: enable Lightning On Mobile field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enableOfflineDraftsEnabled.description: enable Offline Drafts Enabled field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enablePopulateNameManuallyInToday.description: enable Populate Name Manually In Today field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enableS1EncryptedStoragePref2.description: enable S1 Encrypted Storage Pref2 field of MobileSettings metadata component.

enableS1OfflinePref.description: enable S1 Offline Pref field of MobileSettings metadata component.
